channel.title: Land scape problem?
channel.description: im using peeters edited landscape editor, i try and get my landscape in it but it gives me an error a Exception has been thrown

item.title: Land scape problem?
item.dc:creator: @lol_k lol k
item.description:
@lol_k wrote:

already tried that still didnt work,but one horny hamster posted works fine

Read full topic

item.title: Land scape problem?
item.dc:creator: @rocky_rose rocky_rose
item.description:
@rocky_rose wrote:

[quote=“hornyhamster, post:4, topic:299053”][quote author=Old Rsc Player link=topic=395406.msg2937804#msg2937804 date=1251662548]

if anyone knows how to fix peeter’s version i’ll be happy :3 but that one works till you can figure it out

what u mean?
[/quote]

i mean i couldnt make peeters version of the client work… so i posted the original editor… and if anyone knows how to fix peeter’s version so it loads the landscape… i’ll use it too[/quote]

Try loading another landscape file, it worked for me. You probably need to load the landscape file from an updated version of your client.

Read full topic

item.title: Land scape problem?
item.dc:creator: @hornyhamster hornyhamster
item.description:
@hornyhamster wrote:

same thing that happened to me use this:

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=F2PKGJLP

only has a 1 square brush… but it at least works, BE SURE TO SAVE BEFORE GOING UNDERGROUND i hat having to redo stuff

if anyone knows how to fix peeter’s version i’ll be happy :3 but that one works till you can figure it out
